      Methods in com.connectsdk.device with parameters of type ConnectableDevice 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DefaultConnectableDeviceStore.addDevice(ConnectableDevice device)

      Add a ConnectableDevice to the ConnectableDeviceStore.
      void ConnectableDeviceListener.onCapabilityUpdated(ConnectableDevice device, List<String> added, List<String> removed)
      When a ConnectableDevice finds & loses DeviceServices, that ConnectableDevice will experience a change in its collective capabilities list.
      void ConnectableDeviceListener.onConnectionFailed(ConnectableDevice device, ServiceCommandError error)
      This method is called when the connection to the ConnectableDevice has failed.
      void ConnectableDeviceListener.onDeviceDisconnected(ConnectableDevice device)
      When all of a ConnectableDevice's DeviceServices have become disconnected, the disconnected message is sent.
      void ConnectableDeviceListener.onDeviceReady(ConnectableDevice device)
      A ConnectableDevice sends out a ready message when all of its connectable DeviceServices have been connected and are ready to receive commands.
      void ConnectableDeviceListener.onPairingRequired(ConnectableDevice device, DeviceService service, DeviceService.PairingType pairingType)
      DeviceService listener proxy method.
      void SimpleDevicePickerListener.onPickDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
      Called when device is ready to use (requested permissions approved).
      void DevicePickerListener.onPickDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
      Called when the user selects a device.
      void SimpleDevicePickerListener.onPrepareDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
      Called when the user selects a device.
      void DefaultConnectableDeviceStore.removeDevice(ConnectableDevice device) 
      void ConnectableDeviceStore.removeDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
      Removes a ConnectableDevice's record from the ConnectableDeviceStore.
      void DefaultConnectableDeviceStore.updateDevice(ConnectableDevice device) 
      void ConnectableDeviceStore.updateDevice(ConnectableDevice device)
      Updates a ConnectableDevice's record in the ConnectableDeviceStore.
